channel.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
channel.description:
k, so I'm serious face now. The Sex Lives thread was a joke, this is not. Although that shouldn't stop you from posting about you sexual encounters. :wink: Oh, and inb4 cool story bro cuz we all is serious face.[/SIZE] ______________________________________
I am currently head-over-heels for this girl and yeah. ^_^ We patched over our lil' problem.

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

No, it’s not really healthy for him. He’s talking himself down in the mud, and it ain’t pretty to see…or in this case, hear.

But if you insist: A week ago I planned a date on a dating site. Turns out, she didn’t show up. This isn’t exactly something good, because it’s the first time I dated since…“the event”. So, another blow to my just below average self esteem.

It’s a blind date, so it can’t be anything personal. There’s no reason to let it affect your self-esteem.

Read full topic

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
On the short term that’s the case with me as well. However, the women that do love me, really really love me usually. Sadly, it’s only 1/1000 for me.

Read full topic

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Well… I suppose there is always that theory of asking every single girl out so that your odds go up on actually nabbing a decent date. Not sure if I would have the stomach for something like that tho.

1 out of 5 requests for dates = success
10 out of 50 requests for dates = success

I dunno… 40 declines seem harsh… wouldnt it?

I’m closer to 1 for every 100 women that I ask saying yes. And I have only been on dates with three of the six women that have said yes to a date.

Women don’t like me

Read full topic

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
6 years with multiple partners and doing almost everything that’s possible without breaking my penis, and/or really gross and involves multiple people at the same time besides me and my parter. Yeah, I guess I’m a nymphomaniac. I dislike prostitutes though, and it’s not just for the sex, incase you cannot blacktext, in which case lern2blacktext.

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Hey hey hey… we all have our down times. And unlike some people in this thread, he is simply stating his current observation/opinion. Rather than tell someone they are wrong, hows bout offering up your own opinion so that the rest of us can diss and crap all over YOUR moment. Or at least allow him his moment so that he can get on with it.

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Basicly, what Sas is getting at, you’re becoming a gothfag. And we sure as hell don’t want you to become one.

Also: You always have something to talk about, don’t you. When we tell you not to complain about your sex life anymore, you talk about your love life. Get your shot together dude. This is just painful to hear. You’re infecting me with your emo virus :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: ITT: Our Love Lives
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Also: Women are NOT like “gift boxes”. They are together with you because they WANT something FROM you, not because they want to GIVE something TO you.

The only women resembling gift boxes are nymphomaniacs - and they won’t restrict themselves to one partner, especially not YOU or ME, because there is always somebody who can perform better in the sex department. Also, it is not like they have a choice. It’s a mental and physical disease, not a state of being charitable.

Read full topic
